entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
